A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had so many plot holes and was made to just make money and look cool. It threw away a lot of set up from the first film and was just not compelling at all. The characters were one-dimensional and the side quest with Finn and Rose could have been taken out completely; it had zero bearing on the plot. This is poor science fiction and story telling. I give this movie one alien boob out of four.
